channel.title: How to run a server with multiple pc's over the world? (so with ur friends)
channel.description: what program do i use to share the file for evryone that i wan't and that any changes in the server are saved in it , like the character files or changes in the client

item.title: How to run a server with multiple pc's over the world? (so with ur friends)
item.dc:creator: @t_a_i_n_t t a i n t
item.description:
@t_a_i_n_t wrote:

If you want do this, its called portforwarding. This allows many players to connect to you from your computer. since i dont want to get in trouble, its in the 5 min tut.
